announcements.title: Beta 3 Released - CEF Crash Fix
announcements.content: CST Reader Beta 3 is now available with the critical CEF crash fix, scroll position restoration, complete Dark Mode support, and phrase/proximity search with two-color highlighting.

5.0.0-beta.3.title: You're Running Beta 3
5.0.0-beta.3.content: Thank you for testing Beta 3! The critical CEF crash issue has been fixed. Please report any issues on GitHub.

5.0.0-beta.2.title: Beta 3 Available - Critical Crash Fix
5.0.0-beta.2.content: Beta 3 is now available with a critical fix for CEF crashes when floating book windows, plus scroll position restoration and complete Dark Mode support.

5.0.0-beta.1.title: Beta 3 Available - Critical Crash Fix
5.0.0-beta.1.content: Beta 3 is now available with a critical fix for CEF crashes when floating book windows, plus scroll position restoration and complete Dark Mode support.
